code: @Test public void testJdbcRoutes() throws Exception {     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("jstrachan").     template.sendBody("direct:hello", "select * from customer order by ID").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:hello").to("jdbc:testdb").transform().simple("${body[0]['NAME']}").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
